title: Pokrovka-4 mound
description: Burial mound near the Sentelek River in Altay, Russia, containing remains associated with the Afanasievo Culture (31st-29th centuries BCE) and the Pazyryk Culture (4th-3rd centuries BCE).

properties.description: Point represenging the approximate imagery location of the Pokrovka-4 site, after Shul'ga 2021.
properties.title: Imagery location of Pokrovka-4
